inputs.name: EmailBody
inputs.value:
Dear Sir/Ma'am,

Kindly review and approve the Project Charter by clicking the link below:

Regards,
The PMO team

inputs.name: EmailSubject
inputs.value: Resubmission - Approval required for new project - @{outputs('Update_a_row_-_Pending_CTO_Review')?['body/msdyn_subject']}

inputs.name: EmailBody
inputs.value:
Dear PMO, 

Hope you are well. 

We have a resubmission for the @{outputs('Update_a_row_-_Pending_CTO_Review')?['body/msdyn_subject']}.The rejection was due to:-
Rejection comments:- @{outputs('Update_a_row_-_Pending_CTO_Review')?['body/advcellp_latestcomment']}

You have now 14 days to approve the project in the system, after this time project will be automatically rejected.  

Kind Regards, 
The PMO Team.
